Lyric:
[00:14.880]Maybe I'm just crazy
[00:16.780]Maybe I'm just fool
[00:18.590]Maybe I don't know how to love
[00:20.270]But maybe I do
[00:22.530]Maybe you know more then me
[00:24.090]But this much is true
[00:25.960]This little heart and brave mind, we say
[00:28.650]We're through with you!
[00:30.580]And I wonder does it blow your mind,
[00:34.280]That I'm leaving you far behind
[00:38.250]I wonder does it stop your heart
[00:40.950]To know you're not my sunshine anymore
[00:46.040]Ok you're pretty, your face is a work of art
[00:49.180]Your smile could light up New York City after dark
[00:53.550]Ok you're a cover boy beauty stand for the beauty mark,
[00:57.260]But it's such a pity, a boy so pretty
[01:01.670]With an ugly heart
[01:10.600]Maybe you'll get married and she will kiss your feet
[01:14.180]While I gave on my rides away, I will lose no sleep
[01:18.290]Maybe on your honeymoon, you'll think of me
[01:21.840]But if you don't, I won't tryna tell you I can guarantee
